titles.title: To prohibit the use of certain funds to host Iranian officials for Independence Day celebrations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 6/24/2009--Introduced. Prohibits FY2009 funds made available to the Department of State or any other federal department or agency from being used to host Iranian officials for the July, 4, Independence Day celebrations internationally or domestically.
